projects.title: Undo / Redo prototype
projects.blurb: A vanilla-javascript (no libraries) example of basic workspace undo and redo actions, written with Coffeescript and SASS

projects.title: About WebGL
projects.blurb: Here is an introductory presentation I gave on WebGL (without using any libraries!) see the video at vimeo.com/69136718

projects.title: Snack Nutrition Graph
projects.blurb: A fun graph of nutrition information for the snacks at my office. It's sortable, click the boxes in the key at the bottom.

projects.title: Quad Tree Visualization
projects.blurb: An experiment with an optimisation system for a bunch of moving things (particles)

projects.title: Popularity of JS Frameworks
projects.blurb: Wondering which Javascript framework is the most talked about on Stack Overflow? Data from May 2014

projects.title: USA Unemployment Map
projects.blurb: An example of D3.js' mapping and animation with data from 2008. More at bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4060606

projects.title: Tunnels
projects.blurb: An art + code experiement with generated geometry, point lights and a flying camera

projects.title: Wireframe Globe
projects.blurb: Another experiement, this one an homage to the graphics of 'War Games' ca. 1984

projects.title: A Golden Head
projects.blurb: Environment reflections and bump maps help sell this head model as gold

projects.title: Galaxy61.com
projects.blurb: This is a freelance project for a Brooklyn-based animation production studio. Dynamic and resposive design. Backbone.js, Underscore.js and jQuery provide the framework.

projects.title: RicochetMedia.net
projects.blurb: At NYTimes.com's R&D Ventures, I lead the front-end development team on a product called Ricochet, a B2B social media marketing platform for publishers and advertisers.

projects.title: TapSynth
projects.blurb: I built an iOS App from concept to App store in 2 months. TapSynth puts an exclamation mark on a year and a half of Objective-C study. Site design by Danielle Primiceri.

projects.title: Introduction to Backbone.js
projects.blurb: A presentation at UPenn; showing off the power of Backbone.js

projects.title: NYT's Most Popular
projects.blurb: This web app uses data from NYTimes.com search API to display the most popular topics. Built with Three.js and jQuery.

projects.title: CG Effects Reel
projects.blurb: My visual effects reel, including personal and commercial works from the past 8 years. Software skills include Maya, After Effects and Real Flow.

projects.title: Pasta Sauce for Cats
projects.blurb: I wrote, designed and animated this piece. Lovingly dedicated to Squeegee. Made with Maya, Shake & Photoshop.
